page.title: 13POPULATION
page.content:
To discover facts about the local populace,using the four schools,we asked the following:_ a)How long have you lived here. {20% here 0- 5 yrs.30% here 5-10yrs. {23% here 10-15 yrs.16% here 15-20yrs. { 11% here over 20yrs.
b)Where did you live previously? { 45% from London.35% rest of Essex. { 4% S.E.Counties. 3% The Midlands. { 3% Scotland. 3% Abroad. { 2% East Anglia. 5% Born here.
c)How far from home do you work? {8% in district {13% 0- 5 mls.away.14% 5-10 mls.away {23% 10-20 mls.away.42% over 20mls.away
d)How do you travel to work? {80% travel by car, 10% by train,. { 5% travel on foot, 5% by bus.
